attributes.action: Remove visa requirements and offer asylum and support to Ukrainian refugees
attributes.additional_details: As a modern, developed country UK should stand against war crimes and violence towards innocent people living through the scariest time of their lives.
attributes.background: UK should remove visa requirements and offer support and asylum to Ukrainian people until the war is over.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
